name: California Digital Newspaper Collection
description: Free access to digitized California newspapers from 1846 to present
fullDescription: The California Digital Newspaper Collection provides free access to digitized California newspapers from 1846 to the present for historical research.
whatTheyOffer:
- Digitized California newspapers from 1846-present
- Searchable full text
- Historical newspapers from across the state
- Free to access without library card
- High-quality scans of original pages
howToGetIt:
1. Visit cdnc.ucr.edu
2. Search by keyword, date, or location
3. Browse available newspaper titles
4. View and download pages for free
5. No registration or library card required
